text: Helen Jane Gilyard (born 1963), is a female former swimmer who competed for England. ==Swimming career== Gilyard represented England and won a bronze medal in the 4 x 100 metres medley relay, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:English female swimmers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in swimming Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Swimmers at the 1978 Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Helen Gilyard
